title: BBC.Glastonbury.2013.Highlights.720p.HDTV.x264_TTL
description: All credit to the original upper. All I did was download the 1920x1080 file and compress and re-upload for those who can't afford to download 15GB files.  Enjoy and please share. Hopefully I will be able to do this for all of BasilBrush's uploads here at TPB. These are from another source. So far he has uploaded over 73 GB so it will take a while . On the larger files I will try to find a place to break those files into smaller files for a better upload down the road. Be patient as it will take some time.    Enjoy and please share.
